forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a mild embrace, with temperatures nestled in the low fifties. The remnants of the night’s blanket of clouds are giving way to a promising day, as the sun prepares to stretch its rays across the sky. The wind, a gentle whisper from the west-southwest, has begun to pick up, rustling the trees and adding a crisp edge to the atmosphere. 

The forecast speaks of sunlit hours ahead, where temperatures will flirt with the mid-sixties, then settle into a cooler embrace as afternoon approaches. Conditions appear clear, granting a chance to witness the beauty of the Golden Gate in its clarity, though a cool marine layer might linger along the shore, teasing the edges of the horizon. The day invites a light layering of clothing—perhaps a simple shirt beneath a windbreaker, ideal for a stroll along the waterfront or a jaunt through the bustling streets, where one can enjoy coffee on a vibrant patio or absorb the day as it unfolds amid the lively hum of the city. Such a day beckons exploration—not too hot, not too cold, just the right note for a simple yet enriching experience under the sun.
